vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Ezr.8.16
§ Jarib = "he contends"
1) a son of Simeon
2) one of the chief men of Israel who returned from exile with Ezra
3) son of Jozadak and a priest of the house of Jeshua who married a foreign wife and was compelled by Ezra to put her away
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (2a) יָכִין   hijo de Simeón; (2b)   jefe; en tiempos de Esdras; (2c)   sacerdote; en tiempos de Esdras
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
雅立 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "抗爭者"
1) 西緬的兒子之一(代上 4:24)
2) 和以斯拉一同回歸的以色列的民的領袖之一(拉 8:16)
3) 祭司約書亞一脈的約薩達的兒子, 他娶了一外邦女子為妻,
因以斯拉之要求而被迫與之離婚 (拉 10:18)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
雅立 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "抗争者"
1) 西缅的儿子之一(代上 4:24)
2) 和以斯拉一同回归的以色列的民的领袖之一(拉 8:16)
3) 祭司约书亚一脉的约萨达的儿子, 他娶了一外邦女子为妻,
因以斯拉之要求而被迫与之离婚 (拉 10:18)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Ezr.10.18
§ Jarib = "he contends"
1) a son of Simeon
2) one of the chief men of Israel who returned from exile with Ezra
3) son of Jozadak and a priest of the house of Jeshua who married a foreign wife and was compelled by Ezra to put her away

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Simeon living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Gen.46.10;
son of: Simeon (H8095);
brother of: Jemuel (H3223), Jamin (H3226), Ohad (H0161), Zerah (H2226L) and Shaul (H7586H); also called Jarib at 1Ch.4.24;
Another name of ya.khin (יָכִין "Jachin" H3199)
§ Jarib = "he contends"
1) a son of Simeon
2) one of the chief men of Israel who returned from exile with Ezra
3) son of Jozadak and a priest of the house of Jeshua who married a foreign wife and was compelled by Ezra to put her away
